data.name: LTO Arcade : Supporter Package
data.detailed_description:
Want to show extra support?? Grab the Supporter Package and receiving the Legendary Legacy Fighter!

I'm fairly new to the game making industry and excited to continue creating games for years to come - if you'd like to show some extra support here's a fancy new fighter ship for you to use in the Arena.

Enjoy *

data.short_description: Support me by purchasing the Supporter Package and receiving the Legendary Legacy Fighter!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core duo core 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
